description: This is a Python source file that defines functions to generate code for JSON-RPC interfaces, including event emission, RPC function registration, and namespace handling. It appears to be part of a code generator for a larger project.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates code to emit a JSON-RPC event, including constructing the function prototype, handling parameters, and producing the event call.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the header part of the RPC source file, including includes, namespace openings, and version info.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Closes namespace blocks and performs cleanup for RPC source code generation.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits code defining the version information for the RPC interface.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the main body of the RPC source code, registering methods, events, and managing namespace structure.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Top-level function to generate the complete RPC code, including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates code for the versioning of the RPC interface.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
